name: SlideRule Labs, Inc.
description: Developer of an educational platform designed to make quality education accessible to everyone. The company's workforce upskilling platform offers online courses with one-to-one mentorship and job placement support, enabling people to break into in-demand tech careers in data science, UX design, and software engineering.
one_liner: Developer of an educational platform designed to make quality education accessible to everyone. The company's workforce upskilling platform offers online courses with one-to-one mentorship and job placement support, enabling people to break into in-demand tech careers in data science, UX design, and software engineering.
